overview: Summer is here, it's really hot and we are on holidays, so let's go out, enjoy and fuck as if there was no tomorrow. And this is exactly what Anita Bellini, Belle Claire and the twins Silvia and Eveline Dellai do in this Private Specials, Balearic Love. They will make sure they make the most out of their holidays in Formentera, and have as many good fucks as possible. This means they start with anal sex, so do not miss these 5 scenes filled in with the best of it, as well as interracial sex, a threesome, an orgy and DPs, harder and deeper than ever. Private wants to make sure that you have the summer of your life!
title: Balearic Summer Love
